channel.title: Client crashes down by surprise? Fast help plz =')
channel.description:
I'm using Boxingscape as source, and also using Boxingscape's client. I've made few changes there (changing IP etc.). Why does the client crash after like 10 seconds after I log in? It doesn't crash, when I'm not moving. I can spawn items. I can change my account's rights etc. I can spawn npc's. It just says ; ClientHandler : Client XXXXX disconnected. Pictures needed? I'll get 'em if you want to.
Like, everytime I do an action, Move, Talk to an npc, Etc, etc, etc.
The client just closes.

item.title: Client crashes down by surprise? Fast help plz =')
